name: Artista - Big Papi by David Ortiz - Firecracker
brand: Artista, Big Papi by David Ortiz
additionalNotes: Artista Cigars & David Ortiz came together to form a Dominican Dream Team. What they created is a one of a kind premium cigar that smokes like no other and stands out from other celebrity cigars in quality, smokeability, and style. Fans of baseball and cigars alike will love the presentation: a large red and white box captures your attention. The cigar is attractively adorned with a red and white band featuring Ortizâ€™ silhouette in his signature gesture pointing to the sky in tribute to his mother.
